sn2.19:1.2: Standing to one side, the god Uttara recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.19:2.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:2.2: There’s no shelter for one led on by old age.
sn2.19:2.4: do good deeds that bring happiness.”
sn2.19:3.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:3.2: There’s no shelter for one led on by old age.
sn2.19:3.4: a seeker of peace would drop the world’s bait.”
